conclusion: At t=1 s, the velocity is -5 m/s, which means the speed is 5 m/s.
At t=3 s, the velocity is -7 m/s, which means the speed is 7 m/s.
At t=2 s, the tangent is very steep, maybe around -9 m/s, so speed is 9 m/s.
At t=1.5 s, if I imagine the tangent, it might be around -5 m/s again, but I'm not sure.
The average velocity between t=1 s and t=3 s is -5 m/s.
